hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo [INFO] echo [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------ echo [INFO] Create Spring Boot Admin Debian Package echo [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------ echo [INFO]
TARGET_DIR=${WORKSPACE}/spring-boot-admin-samples/spring-boot-admin-sample/target PACKAGE_BASE_DIR=$TARGET_DIR/spring-boot-admin-${BUILD_NUMBER} INSTALL_DIR=$PACKAGE_BASE_DIR/usr/local/spring-boot-admin
mkdir -p $PACKAGE_BASE_DIR mkdir -p $PACKAGE_BASE_DIR/usr/local/spring-boot-admin cp spring-boot-admin-samples/spring-boot-admin-sample/target/spring-boot-admin-sample.jar $INSTALL_DIR/spring-boot-admin.jar
mkdir -p $PACKAGE_BASE_DIR/DEBIAN cat > $PACKAGE_BASE_DIR/DEBIAN/control <<EOL Package: spring-boot-admin Version: ${BUILD_NUMBER} Section: base Priority: optional Architecture: amd64 Depends: Maintainer: Bernd Zuther <bernd.zuther@codecentric.de> Description: Spring Boot Admin This is a simple admin interface for Spring Boot applications. EOL
cat > $PACKAGE_BASE_DIR/DEBIAN/control <<EOL #!/bin/sh set -e
chmod +x /etc/init.d/spring-boot-admin
update-rc.d spring-boot-admin defaults
service spring-boot-admin force-reload EOL
cat > $PACKAGE_BASE_DIR/etc/init.d/spring-boot-admin <<EOL #!/bin/sh set -e
chmod +x /etc/init.d/spring-boot-admin
update-rc.d spring-boot-admin defaults
service spring-boot-admin force-reload EOL
BUILD_ARTIFACT_FILENAME=spring-boot-admin.deb BUILD_ARTIFACT=$TARGET_DIR/$BUILD_ARTIFACT_FILENAME dpkg-deb --build $PACKAGE_BASE_DIR $BUILD_ARTIFACT
echo [INFO] echo [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------ echo [INFO] Deploy Spring Boot Admin Debian Package echo [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------ echo [INFO]
scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -v $BUILD_ARTIFACT vagrant@monitoring-node:/tmp/$BUILD_ARTIFACT_FILENAME ssh vagrant@monitoring-node -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -v <<EOF sudo dpkg --install /tmp/$BUILD_ARTIFACT_FILE EOF
